snippet: A computer system developer who worked in the private sector writes that flawless systems at start-up are rare, so we shouldn’t expect Obamacare to be flawless either.
lead_paragraph: A computer system developer who worked in the private sector writes that flawless systems at start-up are rare, so we shouldn’t expect Obamacare to be flawless either.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
